transcript:
Customer: Sabse achha service hai.
Halo.
Executive: Halo. Haan ji sir boliye.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Mera ek account hai aapke yahan register.
Hmm. Aleena International ke naam se.
Hanji bataiye.
Han to uska mujhe ko char mahina ho gaya karib liye hue lekin kuch ho nahi raha meri parso bhi baat hui thi aapke yahan to mujhe uska paisa return chahiye.
Executive: A paisa return chahiye aapko.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Paisa return chahiye.
Sir wo to nahi ho payega.
Halo.
Customer: Kyun nahi ho payega bhai IndiaMART ki policy hai aisi.
Jab maine liya tha tabhi mujhe bataya gaya tha ki agar aapko teen mahina tak koi business na mile to aapko paisa return hoga.
Executive: Sir dekhiye wo to nahi ho payega so sorry lekin aap ye bata sakte hain aapko service mein kahan dikkat aa rahi hai to usme hum help kar sakte hain.
Customer: Kyun nahi ho payega jab policy mein aap kahe to kyun nahi ho payega return.
Executive: Sir nahi ho pata ye policy mein nahi hai kahan pe hai.
Customer: Aisa nahi hai aisa nahi hai aap jab hamare yahan jab sales walon ne mujhse baat kiya tha aapke karyadhikari ke madhyam se to unhone kaha unhone ye kaha tha ki teen mahina tak agar koi bhi sale aapko nahi milega to aapka paisa return ho jayega teen mahine ka paisa kat ke.
Executive: Haan to teen mahine tak aapko koi sale nahi mili hai.
Customer: Ek lo record utha karke.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye sir call pe rahiye aap main abhi check karti hun.
Video meet pe aa sakte hain sir aap abhi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Video meet pe aa sakte hain main link bheju aapko.
Customer: Video kya kya kar video.
Executive: Video video call video call sir.
Customer: Video call se kya fark pad jayega.
Executive: Sir main aapki problem wahan pe solve kar dungi na telependent aapki.
Customer: Mujhe koi problem nahi mujhe koi problem solve nahi mujhe apna paisa return chahiye.
Executive: Sir ek baar video meet pe aa jaiye taki main discuss karun.
Customer: Nahi nahi mujhe mujhe koi video meet wagaira main nahi karunga aapse aapko jitna main keh raha hun utna aap mera apni service kijiye aage.
Executive: Thik hai ek minute main pehle check karun aapne koi lead consume ki hai ki nahi.
Kyunki agar aapne lead consume nahi ki usi case mein mil jata hai paisa wapas.
Ek minute.
Executive: Sir ye baat jo aap keh rahe hain ki matlab kahan pe kisne bola hai aapse ye baat ki matlab return hota hai paisa.
Customer: Jin logon ne mera ye karaya tha aur jo hamara
Executive: Kisne bola aapko.
Customer: Main naam thodi yaad rakhta hun kisne baat hui.
Executive: Achha.
To sir kisne aapko.
Customer: Main thodi ye ye ye sanstha hai na bhai.
Hmm.
Customer: Kyunki aisa ye IndiaMART ka platform hai na koi khair gira thodi hai ki aap mujhse naam puch rahe hain kis se baat hua tha koi dukan hai jisme char aadmi baithe hote hain.
Executive: Sir baat suniye baat ye hai ki matlab ye policy hai hi nahi return hone wali to ye baat aapse kahi kaise ki matlab teen mahine mein agar.
Customer: Abhi abhi abhi to aap bhi keh rahi thi abhi to aap bhi keh rahi thi yahi baat ki bhai agar teen mahine mein aapka nahi hua to return ho jayega.
Executive: Sir ye cheez aapko main yahi cheez puch rahi hun aapko aapko bola hi kisne ki ye.
Customer: Abhi to filhal aapne bola aise to bahut sare logon ne mujhse bola jinse main baat kar raha hun shuru mein hi jab unhone policy mujhse subscribe bhi maine liya tha tab bhi yahi sab baatein hui thi agar teen mahine nahi mila mujhe ek rupya ka bhi kam nahi mila to kya hoga bole ki bhai wapas hoga aapka paisa teen mahine ka kat karke.
Dekho bhai mujhe paisa wapas chahiye baki aap dekho nahi to fir main koi dusra rasta taiyar karun.
Halo.
Executive: Aapki aawaz saaf nahi aa rahi hai bahut bahut congestion hai aapki aawaz mein.
Executive: Ek minute sir rukiye.
Halo. Haan sir boliye.
Executive: Aawaz aa rahi hai meri aapki.
Customer: Haan ab ab aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sir bas aap aap se question hai ki aap return kyun chahte hain jab aap lead to consume kar rahe hain aap.
Customer: Are to ek bhi dhandha nahi mila aaj tak to main apna paisa barbad kar dun yahan pe yahan pe bilkul char chutiyaape ka platform hai koi kam hai yahan pe bewakoof banate ho aap log.
Executive: Sir kya.
Customer: ₹10 ka bhi isme se kam mila ho agar isme se ₹10 ka bhi kam mila hota to main samajhta ki chalo thik hai.
Ek ek aadmi bhi agar agree hota do piece bhi mera bik jata mujhe samajh mein aata yahan to kuch hai hi nahi faltu ka nautanki hai.
Isliye mujhe apna paisa wapas chahiye.
Sir dekhiye mujhe nahi malum main na main naam bahut sunta tha lekin jab iske andar main in gaya to mujhe samajh mein aaya ki bada ghatiya hai.
Andal hoga main to abhi panch che logon ko aur karane wala tha apne yahan.
Executive: Sir isliye main apne senior ko transfer kar rahi hun ek baar aap unse baat kar lijiye.
Han karao transfer.
Halo.
Executive: Halo. Haan ji good afternoon sir Pallavi baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART se bataiye.
Customer: Pallavi ji main Aleena International se baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Mujhe jo hai aapke yahan teen mahina se jyada ho gaya lekin abhi tak mujhe jo hai koi business wagaira nahi mila aapke yahan isliye mujhe apna subscription khatam karna aur paisa wapas lena teen mahine ka aap kat ke mera paisa wapas kijiye.
Executive: Sir aapka business dekhiye business aisa nahi hota ki ek mahine do mahine teen mahine ke andar 100% aapka business ho jayega hume bhi pata hai sir jab aap koi business.
Customer: Mujhe ek bhi agar lead mil jata tabhi main santusht hota aap meri baat suno maine bahut koshish kar li main bada naam suna tha IndiaMART ka.
Executive: Thoda suniye.
Customer: Badi tarife ki hai sir aapke logon ne lekin ye do paise ka platform hai yahan to pareshan ho gaya main mera waqt bhi barbad hua paisa bhi barbad hua.
Executive: Sir dekhiye aapne paisa lagaya hai ek saal ke liye aapne paisa lagaya hai kyunki hume pata hai sir is saal ke liye aapko kuch hum achhi deal de payenge thik hai aur hume pata hai sir agar aapko hum business denge to aap agle saal hamare sath judenge.
Customer: Chalo agar aisa hoga to agle saal hum fir jud jayenge lekin filhal aap return karwao hamara.
Executive: Thik hai ye to kal wali baat ho gayi sir hume pata hai ki business kabhi bhi aa sakta hai chhathe mahine mein bhi business aa sakta hai.
Customer: Agar ye platform achha hota na agar aapka platform to aata business aisa nahi tha agar ye platform achha hota reputed hota to aata business.
Lekin ye platform bilkul bahut ghatiya platform hai.
Executive: Sir platform bilkul ghatiya nahi hai bahut achha platform hai.
Customer: IndiaMART to mujhe wo Alibaba.com raha mere liye.
Executive: Sir to wahan pe bhi to aapko service use karni padegi na agar aap other platform ki tarif kar rahe hain.
Customer: Use kya main baithe raho.
Executive: To wahan pe bhi to baithenge na sir Alibaba mein bhi to aap aap buyer se baat karenge na.
Customer: Are bhai wahan se to order milenge lekin ye to bilkul IndiaMART bilkul bekar hai jitna aap log tarif karte ho bilkul hume to bilkul nahi samajh mein aaya bhai isliye mujhe apna paisa return chahiye.
Executive: Sir sorry but dekhiye hamara refund ka koi policy nahi hai.
Customer: Lekin humse to aap logon ne sara subscribe kiya tha aur abhi jis ladki mujhse baat kar rahi thi usne bhi kaha sir agar aapka koi kam nahi hua teen mahina mein to aapka paisa return hoga aap boli policy nahi hai agar policy nahi tha to bande aisa bolte kyun hain.
Executive: Sir kisne bola aapko abhi Hanshika ne aap se baat kar rahi thi abhi.
Customer: Abhi abhi jis se main baat kar raha tha usne bhi yahi bola pehle bhi bahut sare logon ne humse yahi bola subscription bech rahe the aap logon se ki bhai aisa hai ki humne kaha.
Executive: Sir ek baat bataiye agar agar aap kahe ki mere paas mere aapka jo business hai shirt ke liye agar mere paas buyer nahi hai to main aap aap baat kar sakte hain ki aapke paas buyers nahi hai sir hamare paas buyers hain daily inquiry aa rahi hai by lead aa rahi hai.
Customer: Aap by lead wagaira.
Executive: Sir bina baat kare aap false bina baat kare aap false kaise keh sakte hain.
Customer: Are sir maine aisa hi ye sab aapke apne taiyar kiye hue log hote hain jo lead weed dalte hain kyunki maine aath das logon se baat kiya sab kehte hain baad mein nahi sir mujhse galti se chala gaya aur mujhe koi requirement nahi ye sab aap log apna self create kiya hua hai na public ko chutiya banane ke liye.
Executive: Sir nahi sir nahi self create nahi karte hain hum.
Customer: Yahi baat hai agar sahi mayeno mein suno main sahi mayeno mein buyer hota to humne 10 20 50 logon se baat kiya to koi na koi to active hota ki haan sir mujhe chahiye mujhe lena hai aapke kya aisi koi baat sir mujhse galti se dal gaya.
Executive: Abhi kariyega sir abhi dekh lete hain aap mere samne panch lead use kariye chaliye aap keh rahe hain.
Customer: Main ek bhi lead use nahi karunga main ab aapka to fir sir paisa nahi doge mere samne panch lead use kariye paisa nahi doge mam dekho main ziddi aadmi hun agar aap paisa nahi doge to main aapke head office ko plus Noida karyalay ko sabko jo hai high court notice bhejunga fir aap samajhna court ke andar aake mujhse mera 10 20 50000 kharcha ho jayega lekin main zid ke liye dekho samet to sabko dunga faujdari mein.
Ekdam is baat ko aap maan lijiye Noida plus Lucknow High Court ye do jagah kam karunga aapko.
Halo.
Customer: Ab aap mujhe final apna bata dijiye kya karna hai mujhe.
Halo.
Halo.
Halo.
Executive: Sir abhi aap keh rahe hain ki aapke buyer mana kar dete hain ki hume nahi chahiye to jab main aapko challenge kar rahi hun to aap mera challenge accept kariye na sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi karna challenge main jo keh raha hun meri baat suno agar mera paisa nahi return karoge aap to main aapse court mein paise le lunga.
Executive: Sir samajh rahe hain hamara membership kehta hai suniye main wahi aapko bata deti hun aap jab hamari membership lete hain to hum aapko batate hain ki sir aapka ek saal ki service hai hume pata hai ki hum ek saal mein aapko itne buyers denge ki aap apna business kar sakte hain thik hai aur jo aap paisa lagayenge uska haan to ye ek investment hota hai sir aur investment ek saal ka hota hai teen mahine ka investment bol ke nahi kiya tha ki teen mahine ka mera investment hai.
Customer: Dekho mujhse ye kaha gaya tha mere paas dekho ye aapko main proof to dunga nahi mere paas sare aapke record maujud hai recording ke roop mein.
Executive: Dijiye na sir agar mujhe kisi ne aapke achha dijiye na mujhe.
Customer: Wo jarurat padegi nahi sir agar aapke paas recording hai ya kuch bhi hai aap mujhe dijiye kisne bola hai fir hum us bande ke khilaf action lenge.
Executive: Aap ye keh do ki aap ye keh do ki paisa nahi return hoga fir main aapse baat karunga.
Executive: Sir wo to maine aapko kai baar bol diya abhi.
Customer: To nahi kijiyega na final to ho gaya ye hamari aapki customer care mein IndiaMART.
Executive: Ji final hai.
Customer: Final aapka thik hai thik hai koi baat nahi fir court mein milte hain okay thank you.
Executive: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for subscription.

- Claims executive promised refund if no business.

- Customer is unhappy with the platform.



Resolution:

- Executive stated refund is not possible.

- Executive offered to help with service issues.

- Transferred call to senior executive.

- Senior executive reiterated no refund policy.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer threatened legal action.



Alert (If Any):

refund, escalation

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, buyleads, policy
